content: At some point in the last couple months, squeeze_scope seems to have gone missing -- I found a Zulip post from last August mentioning that Std.Tactic.SqueezeScope existed, but I can't find it anymore, even by searching the githubs. I also can't find any changelogs mentioning intentionally removing or moving it, though; am I just missing something or was it silently removed for some reason?

Oh it's in Batteries now. Okay, that makes sense. Thanks!
(Though I have no idea why I couldn't find it by searching github... >.>;)
Robert Maxton has marked this topic as resolved.

This is how you could have found it also:

import Mathlib

#help tactic "squeeze_scope"
